scripts.wdio: rimraf allure-results && rimraf allure-report && wdio config/wdio.conf.js
scripts.local:all:headless: ENV=LOCAL BROWSER=all HEADLESS=true npm run wdio -- --spec
scripts.local:chr:headless: ENV=LOCAL BROWSER=chrome HEADLESS=true npm run wdio -- --spec
scripts.local:chr:pup: ENV=LOCAL BROWSER=chrome PUPPETEER=true npm run wdio -- --spec
scripts.local:chr:pup:headless: ENV=LOCAL BROWSER=chrome PUPPETEER=true HEADLESS=true npm run wdio -- --spec
scripts.local:ff:headless: ENV=LOCAL BROWSER=firefox HEADLESS=true npm run wdio -- --spec
scripts.stage:all:headless: ENV=STAGE BROWSER=all HEADLESS=true npm run wdio -- --spec
scripts.stage:chr:headless: ENV=STAGE BROWSER=chrome HEADLESS=true npm run wdio -- --spec
scripts.stage:chr:pup: ENV=STAGE BROWSER=chrome PUPPETEER=true npm run wdio -- --spec
scripts.stage:chr:pup:headless: ENV=STAGE BROWSER=chrome PUPPETEER=true HEADLESS=true npm run wdio -- --spec
scripts.stage:ff:headless: ENV=STAGE BROWSER=firefox HEADLESS=true npm run wdio -- --spec
scripts.prod:all:headless: ENV=PROD BROWSER=all HEADLESS=true npm run wdio -- --spec
scripts.prod:chr:headless: ENV=PROD BROWSER=chrome HEADLESS=true npm run wdio -- --spec
scripts.prod:chr:pup: ENV=PROD BROWSER=chrome PUPPETEER=true npm run wdio -- --spec
scripts.prod:chr:pup:headless: ENV=PROD BROWSER=chrome PUPPETEER=true HEADLESS=true npm run wdio -- --spec
scripts.prod:ff:headless: ENV=PROD BROWSER=firefox HEADLESS=true npm run wdio -- --spec
scripts.stage:chr:ff:headless: ENV=STAGE BROWSER=docker HEADLESS=true npm run wdio -- --spec
